title: Subsurface Scattering (Translucency) with Sunflow
overview: In this project, we implement a paper by Henrik Wann Jensen to simulate translucent objects. We use Sunflow, an open-source renderer in Java, to do the basic ray tracing and other rendering opertions. We extend Photon Mapping and Diffuse Scattering functions in Sunflow and cast rays from under the surface (thus the name sub surface scattering) to provide the effect of Translucency.
